00086         public function process($gp,$settings) {
00087                 
00088                 //set GET/POST parameters
00089                 $this->gp = $gp;
00090                 
00091                 //set settings
00092                 $this->settings = $settings;
00093                 $this->init();
00094                 
00095                 //send emails
00096                 $this->sendMail('admin');
00097                 $this->sendMail('user');
00098                 
00099                 return $this->gp;
00100         }
00101         
00109         public function setEmailSettings($new) {
00110                 $this->emailSettings = $new;
00111         }
00112         
00121         protected function parseTemplate($mode,$suffix) {
00122                 $template = $this->getTemplate($mode,$suffix);
00123                 
00124                 $markers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getFilledLangMarkers($template,$this->langFile);
00125                 $valueMarkers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getFilledValueMarkers($this->gp);
00126                 $markers = array_merge($valueMarkers,$markers);
00127                 $this->sanitizeMarkers($markers);
00128                 $template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($template, $markers);
00129                 $template = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::removeUnfilledMarkers($template);
00130                 return $template;
00131         }
00132         
00140         protected function sanitizeMarkers(&$markers) {
00141                 $checkBinaryCrLf = $this->settings['checkBinaryCrLf'];
00142                 if ($checkBinaryCrLf != '') {
00143                         $markersToCheck = t3lib_div::trimExplode(',',$checkBinaryCrLf);
00144                         foreach($markersToCheck as $idx=>$val) {
00145                                 if(substr($val,0,3) != '###') {
00146                                         $val = '###'.$markersToCheck[$idx];
00147                                 }
00148                                 
00149                                 if(substr($val,-3) != '###') {
00150                                         $val .= '###';
00151                                 }
00152                                 $iStr = $markers[$val];
00153                                 $iStr = str_replace (chr(13),'<br />', $iStr);
00154                                 $iStr = str_replace ('\\','', $iStr); 
00155                                 $markers[$val] = $iStr;
00156                                 
00157                         }
00158                 }
00159                 foreach($markers as $field=>&$value) {
00160                         $value = nl2br($value);
00161                 }
00162         }
00163         
00172         protected function getTemplate($mode,$suffix) {
00173                 $settings = $this->settings;
00174                 $templateFile = $settings['templateFile'];
00175                 if(isset($settings['templateFile.']) && is_array($settings['templateFile.'])) {
00176                         $templateFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings['templateFile'],$settings['templateFile.']);
00177                 } else {
00178                         $templateFile = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($templateFile);
00179                 }
00180                 $template = t3lib_div::getURL($templateFile);
00181                 $template = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template,"###TEMPLATE_EMAIL_".strtoupper($mode)."_".strtoupper($suffix)."###");
00182                 if(!$template) {
00183                         $template = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template,"###template_email_".strtolower($mode)."_".strtolower($suffix)."###");
00184                 }
00185                 return $template;
00186         }
00187         
00196         protected function sendMail($type) {
00197                 
00198                 $mailSettings = $this->parseMailSettings($this->settings[$type.'.'],$type);
00199                 $template['plain'] = $this->parseTemplate($type,"plain");
00200                 $template['html'] = $this->parseTemplate($type,"html");
00201                 //F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('E-Mail settings for '.$type);
00202                 //F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugArray($mailSettings);
00203                 
00204                 //init mailer object
00205                 require_once(PATH_t3lib.'class.t3lib_htmlmail.php');
00206             $emailObj = t3lib_div::makeInstance('t3lib_htmlmail');
00207             $emailObj->start();
00208                 
00209                 //set e-mail options
00210             $emailObj->subject = $mailSettings['subject'];
00211             
00212             $sender = $mailSettings['sender_email'];
00213             if(isset($mailSettings['sender_email']) && is_array($mailSettings['sender_email'])) {
00214                 $sender = implode(",",$mailSettings['sender_email']);
00215             }
00216             $emailObj->from_email = $sender;
00217             $emailObj->from_name = $mailSettings['sender_name'];
00218             
00219                 $replyto = $mailSettings['replyto_email'];
00220             if(isset($mailSettings['replyto_email']) && is_array($mailSettings['replyto_email'])) {
00221                 $replyto = implode(",",$mailSettings['replyto_email']);
00222             }
00223             $emailObj->replyto_email = $replyto;
00224             $emailObj->replyto_name = $mailSettings['replyto_name'];
00225             $emailObj->returnPath = '';
00226             if($mailSettings['email_header']) {
00227                 $emailObj->add_header($mailSettings['header']);
00228             }
00229             if($template['plain']) {
00230                 $emailObj->setPlain($template['plain']);
00231             }
00232                 
00233                 if($template['html']) {
00234                         if($mailSettings['htmlEmailAsAttachment']) {
00235                                 $tmphtml=tempnam("typo3temp/","/mailformplusplus_").".html";
00236                                 $tmphandle=fopen($tmphtml,"wb");
00237                                 if ($tmphandle) {
00238                                         fwrite($tmphandle,$template['html']);
00239                                         fclose($tmphandle);
00240                                         $emailObj->addAttachment($tmphtml);
00241                                 }
00242                         } else {
00243                         $emailObj->setHtml($template['html']);
00244                         }
00245             }
00246                 
00247                 if(!is_array($mailSettings['attachment'])) {
00248                         $mailSettings['attachment'] = array($mailSettings['attachment']);
00249                 }
00250                 foreach($mailSettings['attachment'] as $attachment) {
00251                         if(strlen($attachment) > 0) {
00252                                 $emailObj->addAttachment($attachment);
00253                         }
00254                 }
00255                 
00256                 #print_r($settings);
00257                 if($mailSettings['attachPDF']) {
00258                         #print "adding pdf";
00259                         $emailObj->addAttachment($mailSettings['attachPDF']);
00260                 }
00261             
00262                 //parse max count of mails to send
00263             $count = 0;
00264             $max = $this->settings['limitMailsToUser'];
00265             if(!$max) {
00266                 $max = 2;
00267             }
00268                 if(!is_array($mailSettings['to_email'])) {
00269                         $settings['to_email'] = array($mailSettings['to_email']);
00270                 }
00271                 reset($mailSettings['to_email']);
00272                 
00273                 $markers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteIssetSubparts($template['html']);
00274                 $template['html'] = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($template['html'], $markers);
00275                 $markers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteIssetSubparts($template['plain']);
00276                 $template['plain'] = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($template['plain'], $markers);
00277                 
00278                 //send e-mails
00279             foreach($mailSettings['to_email'] as $mailto) {
00280                 
00281                 if($count < $max) {
00282                         if (strstr($mailto, '@') && !eregi("\r",$mailto) && !eregi("\n",$mailto)) {
00283                                         $sent = $emailObj->send($mailto);
00284                                 }
00285                         $count++;
00286                 }
00287                         if($sent) {
00288                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Mail sent to: ".$mailto);
00289                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Mail content:",false);
00290                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Sender: ".$emailObj->from_name." <".$emailObj->from_email.">",false);
00291                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Reply to: ".$emailObj->replyto_name." <".$emailObj->replyto_email.">",false);
00292                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Message Plain: ".$template['plain'],false);
00293                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Message HTML: ".$template['html'],false);
00294                         } else {
00295                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Mail sending failed to: ".$mailto);
00296                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Mail content:",false);
00297                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Sender: ".$emailObj->from_name." <".$emailObj->from_email.">",false);
00298                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Reply to: ".$emailObj->replyto_name." <".$emailObj->replyto_email.">",false);
00299                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Message Plain: ".$template['plain'],false);
00300                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Message HTML: ".$template['html'],false);
00301                         }
00302             }
00303                 if($tmphtml) {
00304                         unlink($tmphtml);
00305                 }
00306         }

00316         private function explodeList($list,$sep = ",") {
00317                 $items = t3lib_div::trimExplode($sep,$list);
00318                 $splitArray = array();
00319                 foreach($items as $item) {
00320                         if(isset($this->gp[$item])) {
00321                                  array_push($splitArray,$this->gp[$item]);
00322                         } else {
00323                                 array_push($splitArray,$item);
00324                         }
00325                 }
00326                 return $splitArray;
00327         }
00328         
00336         private function parseSettingValue($value) {
00337                 if(isset($this->gp[$value])) {
00338                         $parsed = $this->gp[$value];
00339                 } else {
00340                         $parsed = $value;
00341                 }
00342                 return $parsed;
00343                 
00344         }
00345         
00356         private function parseValue($settings,$type,$key) {
00357                 if(isset($this->emailSettings[$type][$key])) {
00358                         $parsed = $this->parseSettingValue($this->emailSettings[$type][$key]);
00359                 } else if(isset($settings[$key.'.']) && is_array($settings[$key.'.'])) {
00360                         $parsed = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings[$key],$settings[$key.'.']);
00361                 } else {
00362                         $parsed = $this->parseSettingValue($settings[$key]);
00363                 }
00364                 return $parsed;
00365         }
00366         
00377         private function parseList($settings,$type,$key) {
00378                 if(isset($this->emailSettings[$type][$key])) {
00379                         $parsed = $this->explodeList($this->emailSettings[$type][$key]);
00380                 } else if(isset($settings[$key.'.']) && is_array($settings[$key.'.'])) {
00381                         $parsed = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings[$key],$settings[$key.'.']); 
00382                 } else {
00383                         $parsed = $this->explodeList($settings[$key]);
00384                 }
00385                 return $parsed;
00386         }
00387         
00397         private function parseFilesList($settings,$type,$key) {
00398                 if(isset($settings[$key.'.']) && is_array($settings[$key.'.'])) {
00399                         $parsed = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings[$key],$settings[$key.'.']);
00400                 } elseif($settings[$key]) {
00401                         $files = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings[$key]);
00402                         $parsed = array();
00403                         session_start();
00404                         foreach($files as $file) {
00405                                 #print $file.":";
00406                                 #print_r($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles']);
00407                                 if(isset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$file])) {
00408                                         foreach($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$file] as $uploadedFile) {
00409                                                 array_push($parsed,$uploadedFile['uploaded_path'].$uploadedFile['uploaded_name']);
00410                                         }
00411                                 } else {
00412                                         array_push($parsed,$file);
00413                                 }
00414                         }
00415                 }
00416                 return $parsed;
00417         }
00418         
00426         protected function parseMailSettings(&$settings,$type) {
00427                 if(!is_array($settings)) {
00428                         return array();
00429                 }
00430                 $options = array();
00431                 
00432                 //parse recipients
00433                 $options['to_email'] = $this->parseList($settings,$type,"to_email");
00434                 
00435                 //parse recipient name(s)
00436                 $options['to_name'] = $this->parseList($settings,$type,"to_name");
00437                 
00438                 //parse subject
00439                 $options['subject'] = $this->parseValue($settings,$type,"subject");
00440                 
00441                 //parse sender
00442                 $options['sender_email'] = $this->parseList($settings,$type,"sender_email");
00443                 
00444                 //parse sender name
00445                 $options['sender_name'] = $this->parseValue($settings,$type,"sender_name");
00446                 
00447                 //parse reply to
00448                 $options['replyto_email'] = $this->parseList($settings,$type,"replyto_email");
00449                 
00450                 //parse reply to name
00451                 $options['replyto_name'] = $this->parseValue($settings,$type,"replyto_name");
00452                 
00453                 //parse attachment
00454                 $options['attachment'] = $this->parseFilesList($settings,$type,"attachment");
00455                 #print_r($settings);
00456                 if(isset($settings['attachPDF.']) && is_array($settings['attachPDF.'])) {
00457                         #print "call";
00458                         $generatorClass = $settings['attachPDF.']['class'];
00459                         if(!$generatorClass) {
00460                                 $generatorClass = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_PDF";
00461                         }
00462                         $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent($generatorClass);
00463                         $exportFields = array();
00464                         if($settings['attachPDF.']['exportFields']) {
00465                                 $exportFields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings['attachPDF.']['exportFields']);
00466                         }
00467                         #print_r($exportFields);
00468                         $file = tempnam("typo3temp/","/mailformplusplus_").".pdf";
00469                         $generator->generateFrontendPDF($this->gp,$this->settings['langFile'],$exportFields,$file,true);
00470                         $options['attachPDF'] = $file;
00471                 } elseif ($settings['attachPDF']) {
00472                         $options['attachPDF'] = $settings['attachPDF'];
00473                 }
00474                 if(isset($settings['htmlEmailAsAttachment']) && !strcmp($settings['htmlEmailAsAttachment'],"1")) {
00475                         $options['htmlEmailAsAttachment'] = 1;
00476                 }
00477                 $this->fillLangMarkersInSettings($options);
00478                 #print_r($options);
00479                 return $options;
00480         }
00481         
00489         protected function fillLangMarkersInSettings(&$settings) {
00490                 foreach($settings as &$value) {
00491                         if(isset($value) && is_array($value)) {
00492                                 $this->fillLangMarkersInSettings($value);
00493                         } else {
00494                                 $langMarkers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getFilledLangMarkers($value,$this->langFile);
00495                                 if(!empty($langMarkers)) {
00496                                         $value = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($value, $langMarkers);
00497                                 }
00498                         }
00499                 }
00500         }
00501         
00508         protected function getSettings() {
00509                 return $this->configuration->getSettings();
00510         }
00511         
00518         protected function init() {
00519                 
00520                 //fetch global settings
00521                 $settings = $this->settings;
00522                 
00523                 //set language file
00524                 if(isset($settings['langFile.']) && is_array($settings['langFile.'])) {
00525                         $this->langFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings['langFile'],$settings['langFile.']);
00526                 } else {
00527                         $this->langFile = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($settings['langFile']);
00528                 }
00529                 
00530                 //make cObj instance
00531                 $this->cObj = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tslib_cObj');
00532                 $this->cObj->setCurrentVal($GLOBALS['TSFE']->id);
00533         }
